scripts.start: cross-env BASE_PATH=/ PLATFORM_VERSION=SAAS CLIENT_ID=localhost BPM_HOST=http://192.168.16.172:8170 API_HOST=www.baidu.com WEBSOCKET_HOST=ws://192.123.44.333 SRC_WEBSOCKET_HOST=http://192.168.16.127:8412 SRM_MALL_HOST=www.baidu.com HARD_SOURCE=none node --max_old_space_size=8192 ./node_modules/roadhog/bin/roadhog.js dev
scripts.build: cross-env BASE_PATH=/ PLATFORM_VERSION=BUILD_PLATFORM_VERSION WEBSOCKET_HOST=BUILD_WEBSOCKET_HOST SRC_WEBSOCKET_HOST=BUILD_SRC_WEBSOCKET_HOST BPM_HOST=BUILD_BPM_HOST CLIENT_ID=BUILD_CLIENT_ID API_HOST=BUILD_API_HOST SRM_MALL_HOST=BUILD_SRM_MALL_HOST ESLINT=none node --max_old_space_size=8192 ./node_modules/roadhog/bin/roadhog.js build
scripts.lint: eslint --ext .js src mock tests && npm run lint:style
